response:
Based on the provided Retrieved Chunk, here is the answer to your question about who can see your information and messages on Viber Messenger:

When you post information or communicate with Viber as a business partner, your contact data (phone number, email, address, etc.) and any correspondence will be saved by Viber in accordance with their privacy policy. However, when you post information or communicate with Viber as a regular user, the information you share on the public features of Viber, such as Communities, may be visible to anyone who can access that Community, including other users and the Community admin. This visibility depends on your privacy settings within the Community. If your privacy settings are set to "Everyone," your information and messages will be visible to all members of the Community. If your privacy settings are set to "Friends," your information and messages will be visible to only your friends and the Community admin. If your privacy settings are set to "Only Me," your information and messages will be visible only to you.

Please note that when you communicate with Viber through private messaging or other non-public features, your information and messages will be visible only to the recipient(s) you have directly communicated with, regardless of your privacy settings on Viber.

If you post information on a public feature of our Services or through social media sites, plug-ins or other applications, do not forget this information is public on our Services and, depending upon your privacy settings, may also become public on the Internet.
When you post on Communities, the admin of the Community has the ability to allow everybody to access it, but you can always actively delete messages you posted.

We may receive certain information about you which is stored on social media sites if users of those sites give us access to their profiles and you are one of their friends or connections, depending upon your settings on those sites.

When you communicate with us for business purposes as a b2b partner of ours, we will save your contact data provided by you (phone number, email, address etc), as well as any correspondence we have had.
We use trusted third party processors to keep such data, all in accordance with the provisions of this privacy policy.
You have the ability to opt out of our direct marketing emails at any time and to contact us with any request regarding your data.
